item.description:
Hey everyone,

I'm looking to put together a jam session on the night of 7/12 at my rehearsal space in Charlestown. Looking for a drummer and bassist, and possibly a horn and piano. Please let me know if you're interested in getting together. I'd like to keep the level of playing to a high standard, so please only respond if you've been playing your instrument for a while.

Here are some of the tunes I like to call:

1. All the things you are
2. Alone Together
3. Blues for Alice
4. Blue in Green
5. Fall
6. Falling Grace
7. Gentle Rain
8. Gloria's Step
9. Green Dolphin St
10. Invitation
11. Just Friends
12. Little Waltz
13. Nardis
14. Softly as in a morning sunrise
15. Stella by starlight
16. There Will Never Be Another You

Cheers,

Andrew
item.name: Monday Night Jam
